short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Take control of your chess gaming with this Chrome extension! Set daily game limits ensuring a more focused lichess.org experience!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Take control of your online chess gaming with this Chrome extension! Set daily game limits, ensuring a more focused and responsible lichess.org experience!

Features

- Limit the number of games you play per day on lichess.org
- Block the ability to play new games when you are on a losing streak! (Coming soon!)
